title: 1952 Style
prompt: A hyper-realistic cinematic 3:4 vertical half-body portrait of a young man (25-28) with the exact face from reference image, leaning casually against a 1920s smoky bar table, holding a vintage walking cane. He wears Peaky Blinders-inspired attire-tailored wool three-piece suit, waistcoat, tie, and flat cap. Head slightly down, eyes locked on camera with an intense, confident stare. Warm, ambient lighting casts moody shadows; blurred crowd and glowing whisky bottles in soft bokeh create depth. Shot with 85mm f/1.4 lens, 8K quality, highlighting fabric textures and facial expression.

title: Dodge Challenger–style
prompt: A highly cinematic, ultra-detailed full-body portrait of the subject standing confidently beside a dark, sleek sports car (Dodge Challenger–style) at a dimly lit gas station at night. The subject’s facial features and identity must remain exactly identical to the original reference photo, with no alteration. He looks directly into the camera with a cool, self-assured expression, wearing dark sunglasses, a plain white T-shirt, a loose grey bomber jacket, dark trousers, and sturdy shoes. His hands are casually placed in his pockets. Neon gas station lights cast dramatic highlights and deep shadows, creating a moody cinematic atmosphere. Shot in ultra-realistic photography style, sharp focus, high contrast, shallow depth of field, night cinematography, professional color grading, 8K quality. blurry, low resolution, face change, different identity, distorted face, extra limbs, extra fingers, bad anatomy, oversharpening, noise, watermark, logo, text.

title: A Boy Standing
prompt: Using the reference image as the main subject and facial structure, A cinematic ultrawide, low-angle shot of a young man standing in the same out-door setting. The man is leaning casually against a tall weathered concrete gate, surrounded by lush green branches and barbed wire above. The ground is wet, reflecting the rainy and misty atmosphere. a man wearing a white open rolled-up sleeve cargo shirt and black baggy cargo pant. Keep the misty forest pathway in the background with a dreamy, moody atmosphere.

title: Seeing back in the bus
prompt: Using the reference image as the main subject and facial structure, create a cinematic night-time portrait of a young woman inside a subway train. She is seated near the window, gently looking back over her shoulder with a quiet, emotional expression. Her hair is slightly messy and natural. Soft reflections appear on the train glass, with blurred neon city lights passing outside the window. The lighting feels low and intimate, mixing warm interior metro lights with cool city glow from outside. The background is softly blurred, creating a dreamy bokeh effect. The mood is cinematic, emotional, and atmospheric, inspired by Wong Kar-wai–style film aesthetics, with subtle film grain and natural color tones.

title: Standing with Flowers
prompt: Using the uploaded reference image as the primary subject, facial structure, and pose, create a cinematic, vintage-style street photograph. A young woman stands on a city sidewalk, viewed from a high-angle perspective, looking up toward the camera with a soft, emotional, slightly melancholic expression. Natural makeup, expressive eyes, softly parted lips. Dark brown hair, center-parted, naturally styled with loose strands framing her face. She wears a long classic plaid wool coat with a timeless European aesthetic. In one hand, she gently holds a bouquet of deep red roses with rich textures and realistic petals. In the other hand, she carries a simple brown paper shopping bag. The scene feels candid and cinematic, as if captured from a window or balcony above. Blurred silhouettes of people walking past create motion blur and a sense of life and movement. Textured stone pavement below, slightly cool-toned. Soft natural daylight with a nostalgic glow, diffused as if shot through glass or haze. Gentle highlights, soft shadows, subtle contrast. Muted filmic color grading with warm skin tones, desaturated greens and blues, and deep reds in the roses standing out. Vintage analog film look inspired by 1970s–1990s street photography, subtle film grain, slight edge blur, dreamy atmosphere. Shot on a 35mm film camera, shallow depth of field, realistic textures, cinematic realism, emotional storytelling, timeless aesthetic, high-quality photograph, natural imperfections, soft focus, organic feel.

title: Listing Music
prompt: Using the uploaded reference image as the primary subject, exact facial structure, expression, pose, and lighting reference, create a cinematic black-and-white portrait photograph. A young woman is shown in a close-up to medium portrait, facing slightly to the side with her eyes gently closed and a peaceful, content smile on her face. Strong directional light enters through window blinds, casting dramatic horizontal shadow lines across her face, hair, and upper body. The lighting is high-contrast yet soft, creating deep shadows and glowing highlights, emphasizing facial contours, cheekbones, nose bridge, and lips. Her hair is dark, long, and naturally flowing over her shoulders with realistic texture and subtle shine. She wears casual clothing with a relaxed, intimate feel, and over-ear headphones rest naturally around her neck, adding a modern, lifestyle element. The background is minimal and dark, fading smoothly into shadow to keep full focus on the subject. The mood is calm, introspective, and artistic, evoking quiet moments of solitude and self-reflection. Shot as fine-art black-and-white photography with rich tonal range, smooth gradients, realistic skin texture, natural imperfections, subtle film grain, and organic softness. Inspired by classic portrait photography and cinematic light-and-shadow storytelling. High-resolution, shallow depth of field, soft focus falloff, timeless aesthetic, emotional realism, professional studio-quality photograph.
